role_description: An Ansible role that installs ghorg (a program to clone a user's/org's repositories) on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [ghorg](https://github.com/gabrie30/ghorg) allows you to quickly clone all of an org's, or user's repositories into a single directory.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs ghorg (a program to clone a user's/org's repositories) on nearly any platform.
